post.body: You notice how his girl was trying to comfort him and he barely acknowledged her but hugged his buddies? He's a good man.
My wife was wii bowling once and she smacked her nephew in the back if the head. Down he went
"d @username" I believe
Fail
Id love to, but due to my pre-midnight drinking, probably shouldn't drive. But I've never been one to follow the "law"
Oh man I have friends? I gotta figure out who they are...
Everyday is guarenteed to suck my ass. This is why IT is the worst field, you HATE everyone you work with.
Who's got 2 thumbs and is selfish? This guy... http://twitpic.com/ykha
I feel obligated to buy something from Billy Mays. Maybe a new Passat since he is selling VWs now.
Laying down trying to feel better watching Seinfeld while the boy cries in his room. http://twitpic.com/yjtr
Drank a coke and haven't felt right since. Probably bcuz it was diet coke. Now I feel too full, can't eat, can't drink :-(
If you like Twilight and are in love with Edward, I hate you. Seriously, hate. Love, Josh.
Without alcohol, there is no way it's the happiest place on earth.
Started falling asleep on the couch watching King of the Hill. It's only 5:30!!!
Oh man, food so good. Pizza with pancetta, orange bell pepper and gorgonzola.
If been drinking beer since 2 pm on a weekday and I'm wearing a wifebeater. I feel like a redneck.
Sweet, the wife got spicy nacho doritos. Did you know bestbuy charges $40 for a 14' network cable? It costs like $2 to make.
I think my wireless router is failing. All this time I thought it was Verizon. Bah! Time to plug in my other one...
Oh you will show me a good time tonight. http://twitpic.com/yf3s
2 beers in. Nice. Sending the wife to the store to buy me foody things. Mmmm, food. Anyone available for a "good time" in the next 5 min?
